channel.title: Guy on my server hacking ; never saw anything like this
channel.description:
there was a guy on my server , and he just got like a phat set and money and stuff , he is using proxy so no banning
[code] [scruffy120]: Text [0,0]: u guys should stop sly's cheat client from working[/code]
wath is a sly's cheat client anyway ?
he was using something like ::crackme
so plz advise
ty
axl

item.title: Guy on my server hacking ; never saw anything like this
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

i have a client , but it works on my pc , but not on others … LOL
and my webclient got that error loading or something …

but thx for the replies anyway

so wath you guys are saying is that i can’t do anything ?

Read full topic

im nopt sure but i would find a way to ban him from your server by changing the port used to access or something i dont know.

Sorry

item.title: Guy on my server hacking ; never saw anything like this
item.dc:creator: @Jorsa Jorsa
item.description:
@Jorsa wrote:

1: ::setitem
2: im guessing it would be the client hiding the ip, not proxies
3: its a client sly made.
4: you cant stop it, as it doesnt send command packets that it doesnt need to.

Read full topic
item.source: Guy on my server hacking ; never saw anything like this

item.title: Guy on my server hacking ; never saw anything like this
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Sly’s Cheat client is a client that you can use on other peoples servers to cheat with. I’m not sure that is there any way to block it expect making it so that no one can use it, but that has to be made client-side so it means everyone must use your client. (Don’t think you have one)

Read full topic
